about: My name is Abdou, and I'm a Flutter developer. I use Flutter to build mobile apps that run on both Android and iOS. Interested in working together? Let's have a talk.

projects.title: Telfaza
projects.subtitle: A movie tracker
projects.description: Telfaza is a mobile app that helps you keep track of movies you watched or you're planning to watch. It uses TMDB api to get movie data, and Firebase for authentication/database. It allows you to search movies, filter the results, mark movies as favorite... etc. It works for both Android and iOS.

projects.title: zettai.dev
projects.subtitle: My personal portfolio
projects.description:
This very website you're browsing now is also made using Flutter. It's mobile responsive, and if you want, you can compile the code and run it as an Android/iOS application without changing anything. Amazing... I know.
Flutter for web is still under development, so you may encounter some bugs, especially if you're using a browser other than Chrome.
